faculty.name: Dr. Jane Smith
faculty.title: Associate Professor
faculty.bio: Dr. Smith leads research on human-centered AI systems and ethical AI development. Her work focuses on creating AI that enhances human capabilities.

faculty.name: Dr. Michael Brown
faculty.title: Assistant Professor
faculty.bio: Dr. Brown specializes in machine learning systems and real-world AI deployment challenges.

phd.name: Alice Chen
phd.title: 3rd Year PhD
phd.bio: Alice's research focuses on making AI systems more transparent and understandable to end users.

phd.name: Bob Johnson
phd.title: 2nd Year PhD
phd.bio: Bob explores how humans and AI can work together more effectively through better interface design.

phd.name: Sarah Williams
phd.title: 4th Year PhD
phd.bio: Sarah applies machine learning to healthcare challenges while ensuring equitable and fair outcomes.

phd.name: David Lee
phd.title: 1st Year PhD
phd.bio: David works on building robust AI systems that can be reliably deployed in production environments.

masters.name: Emily Davis
masters.title: 2nd Year MS
masters.bio: Emily focuses on user experience design for AI-powered applications.

masters.name: Chris Martinez
masters.title: 1st Year MS
masters.bio: Chris works on machine learning engineering and operationalizing AI systems.

undergrad.name: Jordan Taylor
undergrad.title: Senior
undergrad.bio: Jordan explores the intersection of AI ethics and policy, working on responsible AI governance.

alumni.name: Alex Kim
alumni.title: Former PhD Student (2023)
alumni.bio: Alex completed their PhD in 2023 and now works as a Research Scientist at a leading tech company.
